comprehensive_overview: netCDF-C++4 is a C++ interface for netCDF4, which is a software library and file format for storing multidimensional scientific data. It provides an object-oriented programming interface to the netCDF library, allowing users to read and write data stored in netCDF format using C++.
core_features: Provides a C++ interface for netCDF4
Allows reading and writing of multidimensional scientific data
Enables manipulation of data stored in netCDF format
